entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 800 metres before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
